ch.uzh.ifi.seal.changedistiller.treedifferencing

接口 TreeMatcher

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BestLeafTreeMatcher

    public interface TreeMatcher
    Interface for all tree matcher. A tree matcher takes two tree (left and right) and finds a match between the nodes of the trees.
    作者:
    Beat Fluri

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void disableDynamicThreshold()
      Disable dynamic threshold.
      void enableDynamicThreshold(int depth, double threshold)
      Enables dynamic threshold for the given depth of Node trees.
      void init(StringSimilarityCalculator leafStringSimilarityCalculator, double leafStringSimilarityThreshold, NodeSimilarityCalculator nodeSimilarityCalculator, double nodeSimilarityThreshold)
      Initializes the tree matcher.
      void init(StringSimilarityCalculator leafStringSimilarityCalculator, double leafStringSimilarityThreshold, StringSimilarityCalculator nodeStringSimilarityCalculator, double nodeStringSimilarityThreshold, NodeSimilarityCalculator nodeSimilarityCalculator, double nodeSimilarityThreshold)
      Initializes the tree matcher.
      void match(Node left, Node right)
      Calculate the matching between the two given Node trees
      void setMatchingSet(Set<NodePair> matchingSet)
      Sets the matching set where match(Node, Node) stores the matching.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        void init(StringSimilarityCalculator leafStringSimilarityCalculator,
          double leafStringSimilarityThreshold,
          NodeSimilarityCalculator nodeSimilarityCalculator,
          double nodeSimilarityThreshold)
        Initializes the tree matcher.
        参数:
        leafStringSimilarityCalculator - the string similarity calculator for leafs
        leafStringSimilarityThreshold - the threshold to verify whether two leafs are similar
        nodeSimilarityCalculator - the (inner) node similarity calculator
        nodeSimilarityThreshold - the threshold to verify whether two (inner) nodes are similar

      • init

        void init(StringSimilarityCalculator leafStringSimilarityCalculator,
          double leafStringSimilarityThreshold,
          StringSimilarityCalculator nodeStringSimilarityCalculator,
          double nodeStringSimilarityThreshold,
          NodeSimilarityCalculator nodeSimilarityCalculator,
          double nodeSimilarityThreshold)
        Initializes the tree matcher.
        参数:
        leafStringSimilarityCalculator - the string similarity calculator for leafs
        leafStringSimilarityThreshold - the threshold to verify whether two leafs are similar
        nodeStringSimilarityCalculator - the string similarity calculator for (inner) nodes
        nodeStringSimilarityThreshold - the threshold to verify whether two (inner) nodes have similar string representations
        nodeSimilarityCalculator - the (inner) node similarity calculator
        nodeSimilarityThreshold - the threshold to verify whether two (inner) nodes are similar

      • match

        void match(Node left,
           Node right)
        Calculate the matching between the two given Node trees
        参数:
        left - to match with right
        right - to match with left

      • setMatchingSet

        void setMatchingSet(Set<NodePair> matchingSet)
        Sets the matching set where match(Node, Node) stores the matching.
        参数:
        matchingSet - set in which the matching is stored

      • enableDynamicThreshold

        void enableDynamicThreshold(int depth,
                            double threshold)
        Enables dynamic threshold for the given depth of Node trees.
        参数:
        depth - the depth for which dynamic threshold is enabled
        threshold - the threshold to use when dynamic threshold is active

      • disableDynamicThreshold

        void disableDynamicThreshold()
        Disable dynamic threshold.
